select.if: SELECT module_id as moduleId,module_name as moduleName,page_url as pageUrl,api_url as apiUrl,parent_id as parentId, (select n.module_name from module n where n.module_id = module.parent_id and n.del_flag = 0) as parentName, fcode,level,orders,module_type as moduleType,alias,parent_alias as parentAlias,remark,icon, create_date as createDate,creator,update_date as updateDate,updater,del_flag as delFlag from module WHERE 1=2

mapper.select: select module_id as moduleId,module_name as moduleName,page_url as pageUrl,api_url as apiUrl,parent_id as parentId, (select n.module_name from module n where n.module_id = module.parent_id and n.del_flag = 0) as parentName, fcode,level,orders,module_type as moduleType,alias,parent_alias as parentAlias,remark,icon, create_date as createDate,creator,update_date as updateDate,updater,del_flag as delFlag from module where module_id = #{_parameter} and del_flag = 0 limit 1
SELECT level,orders from module where parent_id = #{_parameter} and del_flag = 0 ORDER BY level desc,orders desc LIMIT 1
SELECT level,orders from module where parent_id is null and del_flag = 0 ORDER BY level desc,orders desc LIMIT 1

select module_id as moduleId,module_name as moduleName from module where del_flag = 0 and 1=2 and module_type in(1,2) and (page_url is null or page_url = '') and module_type = 2 and (page_url is not null and page_url != '')
